channel.title: Big Interview on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Big Interview on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Matthew Prince Wants AI Companies to Pay for Their Sins
item.description: The Cloudflare CEO joined The Big Interview to talk about standing up to content scraping, the internet’s potential futures, and his company’s relationship to Trump.

item.title: Matthew Prince Wants AI Companies to Pay for Their Sins
item.description: The Cloudflare CEO joined The Big Interview to talk about standing up to content scraping, the internet’s potential futures, and his company’s relationship to Trump.

item.title: Hasan Piker Will Never Run for Office
item.description: The Twitch streamer could pivot from influencer to candidate. But he tells WIRED’s Big Interview podcast he’d rather use his platform to tell Dems “you can’t podcast your way out of this problem.”

item.title: Hasan Piker Will Never Run for Office
item.description: The Twitch streamer could pivot from influencer to candidate. But he tells WIRED’s Big Interview podcast he’d rather use his platform to tell Dems “you can’t podcast your way out of this problem.”

item.title: Onion CEO Ben Collins Hasn't Given Up on Print—or Buying Infowars
item.description: A year after relaunching The Onion as a newspaper, Collins visits Uncanny Valley to talk about why “going into something and not ruining it is bravery.”

item.title: Onion CEO Ben Collins Hasn't Given Up on Print—or Buying Infowars
item.description: A year after relaunching The Onion as a newspaper, Collins visits Uncanny Valley to talk about why “going into something and not ruining it is bravery.”

item.title: Alexis Ohanian’s Next Social Platform Has One Rule: Don’t Act Like an Asshole
item.description: The Reddit cofounder joins WIRED’s “Uncanny Valley” podcast and opens up about his early days in tech, his plans for Digg, the future of women’s sports, and what his immigrant mom taught him about Ame

item.title: Alexis Ohanian’s Next Social Platform Has One Rule: Don’t Act Like an Asshole
item.description: The Reddit cofounder joins WIRED’s “Uncanny Valley” podcast and opens up about his early days in tech, his plans for Digg, the future of women’s sports, and what his immigrant mom taught him about Ame

item.title: Lisa Su Runs AMD—and Is Out for Nvidia’s Blood
item.description: While everyone else has been talking about Nvidia’s GPUs, Lisa Su has discreetly turned AMD into a chipmaking phenom. And as the US-China tech war rages, she’s at the center of it all.

item.title: Lisa Su Runs AMD—and Is Out for Nvidia’s Blood
item.description: While everyone else has been talking about Nvidia’s GPUs, Lisa Su has discreetly turned AMD into a chipmaking phenom. And as the US-China tech war rages, she’s at the center of it all.

item.title: Bryan Johnson Is Going to Die
item.description: Millions of dollars in treatments, supplements, and scans. Immortality through AI. Bryan Johnson’s longevity script has everything—except an ending.
